CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(X7705_SAR_W_Wx_Variant__c) == 'SAR-W with 5 Ethernet GigE ports, AC and DC Power',IMAGE("/resource/1515403550000/ProductImageW", "ProductImageW", 100,150),IF(OR(TEXT(X7705_SAR_W_Wx_Variant__c)=='SAR-Wx w 5 GigE & AC pwr',TEXT(X7705_SAR_W_Wx_Variant__c)=='SAR-Wx w 5 GigE, GPS Rx & AC pwr',TEXT(X7705_SAR_W_Wx_Variant__c)=='SAR-Wx w 5 GigE, PoE+, & AC pwr',TEXT(X7705_SAR_W_Wx_Variant__c)=='SAR-Wx w 5 GigE,PoE+,GPS Rx & AC pwr',TEXT(X7705_SAR_W_Wx_Variant__c)=='SAR-Wx w 4 GigE, 4p xDSL & AC pwr',TEXT(X7705_SAR_W_Wx_Variant__c)=='SAR-Wx w 4 GigE,4p xDSL,GPS Rx & AC pwr'),IMAGE("/resource/1515396971000/ProductImageWx", "ProductImageWx",100,150),'-'))
CustomField.label: Product Image
